channel.title: Tos/Tou Agreement [MUST READ] please
channel.description:
Ok, atm i have a tos/tou in place before you can get the the forums/server...but also atm if anybody knows a link into the website without pressing the accept button they can skip past that and go right into the forums and server. i need a flawless way to make everybody who enters my site everyday pass through that tos/tou so that i will not get shutdown. atm you can look at my forums at this location.
Roidscape.darkbb.com
this is not advertising i am simply asking a question that needs to be seen to be explained.
ok when you get to the site press accept. then when it gives you the redirection url copy that... exit your browser and open a new one. paste that url in the url thing on the top of the browser. it goes right to the page without going to the tos/tou so i need a way to make everyone go to the tos/tou no matter what. BTW...Noone would answer so i reposted...

item.title: Tos/Tou Agreement [MUST READ] please
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

RoidScape.Darkbb:

listen to me closly…you do not know me so stfu and also, you couldnt do any better with the slowest suckiest computer and router on the planet so stfu and gtfo my thread you annoying little kid

  1. Why are you assuming you know me?
  2. You’re calling your computer specs slow? Try living in Egypt.
  3. You’re thread? You’re asking for our fucking help. It’s my choice as to post on this thread or not.
  4. The learning process has absolutely nothing to do with slow specs.
  5. Only a no lifer has computer comebacks. Like really, "slowest and suckiest computer"? really?

All in all, you’ll find that most people are not supporting you, meaning you’re not getting any help.

I show you respect and you call me an annoying kid and tell me to GTFO your thread? Well i’m not going to GTFO, let’s see what you’ll do about it then, shall we?

Read full topic

item.title: Tos/Tou Agreement [MUST READ] please
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“RoidScape.Darkbb, post:4, topic:361476”]isnt there just a way to embed an already made cookie…because i can not follow what they say, i have a minimal amount of knowledge in HTML and JAVA SCRIPT…i do know how to use them both but i have just learned from what i can catch on from copy and pasting code into a document…

LISTEN CLOSLY!..all i need is an external link to a website that can either…

tell me how to generate a cookie that is VERY easY!
or
already have a premade cookie for anyone who needs it and can be used for free.

once again i say…i have absolutely no idea what you are talking about when you say stuff like what you said I Vain I i am sorry but i am not a coder.[/quote]

I’m sorry, but you’re not going to have much success as a private server host with that kind of attitude. You need to search for solutions to your problems and try again and again until you make it; otherwise I suggest you move on to something less demanding.

If you scan through the site page, you will find more tutorials to help you. I think it would help you alot if you start with the basics then move up as you get better at them.

Read full topic

well, ive read that entire thing…i have no idea what it means. my friend in school today tried to describe cookies to me, it failed epicly. all i really need is to know how to make it so that EVERY SINGLE person that enters my website has to press accept in order to enter. atm that is not working.
